DOC.brief_summary: In our study we aim to study the effects of two preparations of Sevoflurane in vital capacity rapid inhalation induction.
DOC.brief_title: Two Different Preparations of Sevoflurane in Induction
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing abdominal surgery Patients with any cardiovascular or respiratory disease, usage of any kind of sedative drug, expected airway difficulty and obese patients (BMI>35) will be excluded from the study
